Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is slightly ribbed and covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of four lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394623) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394623)
